name: Lovers on Deathbed [Zhongli x Venti Fangame]
name_original: Lovers on Deathbed [Zhongli x Venti Fangame]
description:
Secret lovers talk on their deathbed.

.

.

.

A fangame for Zhongli x Venti pairing from Genshin Impact. Made with Kochoapp and can be installed immediately on mobile/tab (apparently only works on Android)

- A kinetic novel (around 20 minutes or less)

- Pairing is Zhongli x Venti from Genshin Impact.

- Beware on how self-indulgent the story is. This is from Zhongven fan for Zhongven fans. 

- This is 100% free, but I appreciate some donation so I can use it for next fangame project!

Twitter @ emilebois.
